TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Greg_Ballard, title = Greg_Ballard, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Greg_Ballard} }

S.FORM: Greg Ballard sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1955, ryax sa tay 29 nqu tay 2, Greg Ballard, squliq na p'unro. (mhuqil sa kawas tay 2016)
